data.title: Stocks end streak, Japanese yen, bitcoin sell-off: Market Takeaways
data.description: US stocks (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) snapped the win streak from their late-November rally as all three of the market averages closed lower. Yahoo Finance markets and data editor Jared Blikre breaks down the biggest market themes from today’s trading day, including 2025's volatility (^VIX), the Japanese yen, and bitcoin's (BTC-USD) continued sell-off in the first trading session of 2025. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.
